category.name: Manufacturing
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: MEMCN_change_notice_mandatory_types
preference.preference_description:
Defines the list of BOMWindow's topline Item types for which a ChangeNoticeRevision is allowed to track changes. Optionally, the topline Item types can be qualified with a Release Status name. Changing the preference value requires a server restart in order to be taken into consideration.
Valid values are in the format "<Item_type><separator><Release_Status>", where the separator must be the value specified by the preference "TcServices_field_separator". For example: * "Mfg0MEPlantBOP" tracks changes in Plant Bill of Processes (Plant BOPs) by forcing a Change Notice to be applied. * "MEProcess;Pending" tracks changes in Bill of Process (BOP) Windows if the configured root revision has "Pending" Release Status by forcing a Change Notice to be applied. * If the entries are "MEProcess" and "MEProcess;Pending", the MEProcess is considered mandatory (the entry without any Release Status always wins). * To specify multiple Release Statuses on one Item type, the 2 entries would be "MEProcess;Pending" and "MEProcess;TCM Released". There is no default value.
